title: How do I change from hacked email?
body: So basically the email I use for here got hacked. As far as I can tell there's no way to recover it but I don't know how to change the email without the old one. Any help would be awesome~

replies.body: Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can help you out individually!  Our account team will be able to update your information and email.  Let me know if you have any questions!
